entries.waypoint_description_1: These Aqualish have decided to make this system of natural caves their base of operations.
entries.player_reset: No. I've decided to stop looking.
entries.player_3_1: Why are you offering this to me?
entries.npc_reset: Go figure. Offer someone a good paying job, and they turn it down because they don't want to get their hands dirty. Get out of my face!
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Good to hear, good to hear. This is where you can find the so-called
. Go out there and make sure they get lost permanently. They're just bad for business.
entries.npc_4_1: Look, here's the deal, okay? These guys have started up a band of mercenaries since they got lost from their detachment. The problem is that they are just too good, and are ruining my company's chance of getting good deals. The less of them there are, the better for us. So, are you interested?
entries.npc_3_1: Go figure. Offer someone a good paying job, and they turn it down because they don't want to get their hands dirty. Get out of my face!
entries.npc_2_1: Good to hear, good to hear. This is where you can find the so-called
. Go out there and make sure they get lost permanently. They're just bad for business.
entries.npc_1_1: You there. Lookin' for a long term job that involves you getting your hands a bit dirty? If so, I know of a place where you can make some money by taking out a group of Aqualishes. They've got all kinds of good weapons on them you probably can use or sell. Interested?
